Constructor Detail

JGraph

public JGraph(javax.swing.table.TableModel model)

JGraph

public JGraph(javax.swing.table.TableModel model,
              java.awt.Color... colors)
Instantiate a new JGraph

Parameters:
model - : The graph will be based on the TableModel, each row is a separated sampling and each column is a different value on the graph
colors - : A table of Color witch will be use to draw Graph, for a best style the number of Color should be same as column number
